text: Naho ba bandi batuye iki gihugu (cya Madina) mbere yabo, bahisemo ukwemera banakunda abimutse babagana, kandi mu mitima ntibararikire ibyo (abo bimukira) bahawe, ahubwo bagaharira abandi bo biretse, kabone nâ€™ubwo na bo ubwabo babaga babikeneye. Kandi abarinzwe kugira ubugugu ni bo bazatsinda
